translations: 激流，奔流（torrent 的复数形式）；倾注

sentences.sentence: The columns crawl through a maze of giant corridors down which fierce snow-fed torrents foam under skies of brass.
sentences.translation: 纵队在迷宫般的巨大走廊中爬行，下方是在黄铜色天空下翻腾着的积雪化成的汹涌激流。

sentences.sentence: The rain came down in torrents.
The rain was coming down in torrents.
